tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sentiment_scores (
    tweet_id INT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    sentiment_type STRING,
    PRIMARY KEY (tweet_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (tweet_id) REFERENCES tweets(tweet_id)
);

CREATE TABLE trading_opportunities (
    opportunity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tweet_id INT,
    analysis_result STRING,
    opportunity_description STRING,
    FOREIGN KEY (tweet_id) REFERENCES tweets(tweet_id)
);

CREATE TABLE tweets (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  tweet_text TEXT,
  user_handle VARCHAR,
  sentiment_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR,
  profile_pic_url VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE hashtags (
  hashtag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  hashtag_text VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE trade_opportunities (
  opportunity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  tweet_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  action VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE tweet_sentiments (
    tweet_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    tweet_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username TEXT,
    follower_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE hashtags (
    hashtag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hashtag_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE trades (
    trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol TEXT,
    trade_type TEXT,
    trade_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE trade_sentiments (
    trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    sentiment_date DATE
)
